description:
**Limited time discount! Only $0.99 instead of $1.49!**

Tumbly is an intuitive Tumblr app for Palm webOS. Right when you launch the app it pulls up your Tumblr dashboard so you can see notifications and posts of people you are following on Tumblr. You can also view posts, drafts and your queued posts of your blogs in just a couple taps. You can also search all of Tumblr, your dashboard and your posts, right from the dashboard view. Create new Text, Photo, Quote, Link, Chat and Audio posts with the easy to use posting feature. You can also edit Text, Photo, Quote, Link, Chat, Video and Audio posts from the dashboard view.
